578400.name: THE GREY MAN Official Soundtrack
578400.description:
Lay back and pour a bowl of funky smooth alien gravy in and around your ears with THE GREY MAN OST.

Featuring the musical stylings of Jon Middleman & Alex Visciotti, this live instrument soundtrack boasts a collection of seven full-length musical morsels, as well as an additional bonus track by Steve Woodzell just to make things extra sweet. It's the perfect music to listen to if you find yourself alone and lookin' to get weird late at night.

Track List

  • 1. Welcome to Tinderboone
  • 2. Camper Panic!
  • 3. Within it
  • 4. Ranger Danger
  • 5. Outskirts
  • 6. Welcome to Totem Park
  • 7. Going Home
  • 8. [BONUS] OLIVE ORANGES

Pick up this soundtrack today and impress your parents, because they're gonna love these sounds.
578400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
